Title: Eastwatch
Writer: George R.R. Martin (based on "A Song of Ice and Fire" by), David Benioff (created by), D.B. Weiss (created by), Dave Hill (written for television by)
Actors: Peter Dinklage, Nikolaj Coster-Waldau, Lena Headey, Emilia Clarke
Plot: Darnerys demands loyalty from the surviving Lannister soldiers; Jon heeds Bran's warning about White Walkers on the move; Cersei vows to vanquish anyone or anything that stands in her way.
